title: Barbecue sweetcorn with smoked chilli garlic butter
description: BBQ corn on the cob with a smoky anchovy-spiked chilli sauce - finger licking good.Equipment and preparation: You will need a barbecue for this recipe.
ingredients: 2 tbsp chopped fresh herbs, such as coriander or parsley
4 tbsp smoked barbecue sauce (or smoked ketchup )
2 sliced smoked chipotle chillies, or fresh chillies
